snippet: Net income was $24.4 million, up from $19.7 million a year earlier and beating analysts' estimates. Revenue was $186.3 million, up about 16 percent from $160.8 million in the year-earlier quarter.
abstract: Net income was $24.4 million, up from $19.7 million a year earlier and beating analysts' estimates. Revenue was $186.3 million, up about 16 percent from $160.8 million in the year-earlier quarter.

headline.main: Strong Quarterly Results for DreamWorks Animation, as Profit Rises 24%
